name: Color Ring - Cash Tournaments
description:
Connect rings to horizontal, vertical or diagonal lines or collect three rings to the same slots!

Simple and popular classic puzzle game with some new amazing features and deep strategy elements.

PLAY TOTALLY FREE OR WITH THE REAL CASH
• Includes fantastic tournaments and head-to-head competitions with cash prizes (where available).

KEY FEATURES
• Play Skillz Multiplayer Tournaments Against Other Users (Skillz.com)
• Fun & Exiting Tournaments
• Head-To-Head Competitions
• Drag & Drop Rings To The Board
• Special Strategy Elements
• Beautiful & Fun Athmosphere

DEEP STRATEGIC ELEMENTS
• Black Hole - Drop Unsuitable Rings Into a Black Hole
• Fire Bomb - Destroy One Block Of The Rings
• Hangar - Storage For Three Different Size Of The Ring
• Build The Big Ring Groups And Clear All The Rings At The Same Time
• Clear The Rows In Succession And Collect More Coefficients

Play fantastic puzzle game against real people and win real cash!
Great short tournaments against real people gives many fun and strategic moments against other players.

Make only the best moves and use special features: black hole, fire bomb and hangar wisely.

In head to head games both players trying to solve same puzzle and player who finished with the most points win!

Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world and gives many fun and exiting moments with the game.

Powered by Skillz: eSports for Everyone.

If you have any questions or proposals to the game, we hope you contact us at support@ccbrothers.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
